event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: The platform administrator should use the output of the showlogs command to determine if a service action is necessary. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: Machine Administration Sofware (MADM) on the domain detected a serious I/O problem.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
Machine Administration Sofware (MADM) on the domain detected a serious I/O problem.

No immediate action is taken and nothing is deconfigured.

The severity of the IO problem can be determined by running the showlogs command on
the XSCF CLI and looking at the madm related log.



The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the affected FRU.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 20 21:19:29 san-ff2-21-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: 7860000772  
   EVENT-ID: 7520d0ab-901b-45b3-946f-a52d18627b6a
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8003-5D for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8003-5D, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 20 21:19:29 UTC 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: 7860000772, HOSTNAME: san-ff2-21-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: 7520d0ab-901b-45b3-946f-a52d18627b6a
   DESC: Machine Administration Sofware (MADM) on the domain detected a serious I/O problem.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8003-5D for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: No immediate action is taken and nothing is deconfigured.
   IMPACT: Problem with an I/O device.
   REC-ACTION: The platform administrator should use the output of the showlogs command to determine
   if a service action is necessary.  Please consult the detail section of the knowledge
   article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command

   
   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u 7520d0ab-901b-45b3-946f-a52d18627b6a

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Mar 20 21:19:29.6612 7520d0ab-901b-45b3-946f-a52d18627b6a SCF-8003-5D
           100%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.madm.io.se

                 Problem in: hc:///chassis=0
                    Affects: -
                        FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                             server-id=san-ff2-21-0/component=CHASSIS



Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.


If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response
event_registry_properties.item: No immediate action is taken and nothing is deconfigured.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: Machine Administration Sofware (MADM) on the domain detected a serious I/O problem.
